much appreciable.In addition, smaller amount of H 2 was reported compared to CO production.However, in current study, CO 2 -CH 4 is efficiently converted to both CO and H 2 at normal temperature under simulated solar energy.This can be attributed to the polymeric structure of g-C 3 N 4 and hindered charges recombination rate by Cu.
